issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
While testing KitchenSink: Phone>Play Movie>Remote streaming , iPhone 3GS does not stream movie from the given URL.

Test to reproduce:
1.Launch Kitchensink; phone> Play movie> Remote Streaming.
2. Move the thumb at the end of the track or wait when movie will finish playing

Expected results:
1. Should see a movie playing (may take a few seconds to load) and streaming should begin and continue until movie is complete. All controls should work appropriately.
2. Should get an alert "Movie Completed!"

Actual Result: 
1. Movie does not get streamed and played. After a few seconds,alert,"Movie Cpmpleted" is shown twice.
fields.summary: iOS: KitchenSink: Phone>Play Movie>Remote streaming , Movie does not get streamed and played from the given URL.

comments.body:
This issue is still reproducible. Used below environment - 
Appcelerator Studio: 3.1.2.201307261628
Titanium SDK: 3.1.2.v20130730133101
ACS: 1.0.4
Alloy: 1.2.0-alpha
NPM: 1.3.2
Titanium: 3.1.1
Titanium-code-processor: 1.0.2-alpha
Device - iPhone4S (iOS v5.1.1)
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
